definition: differing from a norm or standard, something a little different from others of the same type
details:
adjective
- differing from a norm or standard
= example: differing from a norm or standard
- exhibiting variation and change
= example: exhibiting variation and change
noun
- something a little different from others of the same type
= synonyms: variation
- a variable quantity that is random
= synonyms: random variable, variate, stochastic variable, chance variable
- an event that departs from expectations
= synonyms: variance
- (biology) a group of organisms within a species that differ in trivial ways from similar groups
= synonyms: strain
